forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: desktop mode zoom!

comments.text: There's a new "bionic eye" zoom feature for Desktop mode! Just hold Alt pressed while mouse-scrollwheeling (in version 181.9) to zoom in and out of what you're looking at.
(I understand this would be nice to have as option in VR too!) Hope you enjoy!

thread.latestCommentText: (I understand this would be nice to have as option in VR too!) Hope you enjoy!
